name: Virtual Instrument Package
summary: Learn about .VIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: VIP files are similar to .ZIP files since they store other files and are compressed with Zip compression. They allow VI add-ons to be shared and installed in LabVIEW software to extend the software's capabilities.
VIPM is a utility developed by JKI used for managing add-ons with LabVIEW software.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
